        Parameters:
        g1 - grid
        h - height inside the grid
        w - width inside the grid
        Returns:

      • rightSpot

        private static java.lang.String rightSpot(Player player,
                                          int h,
                                          int w,
                                          boolean adjacentRestriction)
        Checks if it is the right spot for the placement without checking restrictions
        Parameters:
        player - player who's trying to place the die
        h - height of the spot
        w - width of the spot
        adjacentRestriction - true if adjacency restriction is enabled
        Returns:
        an error or null

      • insertDie

        public static java.lang.String insertDie(Player player,
                                         int h,
                                         int w,
                                         Die d,
                                         boolean colorRestriction,
                                         boolean valueRestriction,
                                         boolean adjacentRestriction)
        Checks all the requirements for placing the die in the desired spot
        Parameters:
        player - player who's trying to place the die
        h - height of the spot
        w - width of the spot
        d - the die to be placed
        colorRestriction - true if color restriction is enabled
        valueRestriction - true if value restriction is enabled
        adjacentRestriction - true if adjacency restriction is enabled
        Returns:
        null if the requirements are respected, otherwise an error message
